lender.name: David Jewell
lender.loan_because: This is such a unique way of Helping others. I have been in business for over 21years and have had a lot of help on the way, its wonderful and Life-Giving to know I can give a little back to those who need it!
lender.occupational_info:
I work Full time as an Artist, selling Original paintings and Ltd Edition prints from my "Visions into Art" to people from all over our wonderful world.
My hope is that my oil paintings encourage and bring beauty to those who wish to experience the wonders within art.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of women across the world.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: It is an easy and a positive way to help people to overcome their necessities in parts of the world where opportunities aren't given to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work designing fun and safe playground equipment for children to play.

lender.name: Ed
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to work and support their families in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in building bridges between cultures and promoting the awareness of the Middle Eastern culture in the U.S.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.' - Matthew 25:31
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to take care of themselves and how to make healthy decisions. I like to think I make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Uncle Bay
lender.loan_because: When I was a child I used to play in a marching band. One day when I was going to play my tuba in a parade. I hurt my foot and was unable to play. An angel appeared and told me to forget the tuba and save the world. I want this to remind me of that time in my life so I can help others. There is no greater sense of human worth as there is with self gratification.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired truck driver who has driven many freeway miles and never had an accident, except once or twice. I like to philosophize in numerous ways and accents.

lender.name: Serendipity
lender.loan_because: ...every bit helps

lender.name: Michelle Hight
lender.loan_because:
. My very entrepreneurial dad died when I was young, putting my mother and my nine brothers and sisters in a precarious and challenging position. During his lifetime, he taught me the value of entrepreneurship. In the wake of his death, and for many years after, I was shown the beauty and the sharing of humanity, as friends and neighbors opened their hearts... and their wallets... to my mom, brothers and sisters. They provided opportunity, employment, love, prayers and support.
I loan as a way to "complete the circle". It is gratifying to be able to give in a way that empowers, especially to widows with children. I started by investing in the dreams of a few entrepreneurs via Kiva. Then I read a few more stories that tugged at my heart, so I loaned a bit more. I'll keep loaning, and loaning and loaning...! It is so cool to know I can affect the lives of 100, or 1000, or maybe even 10,000 entrepreneurs in my lifetime!
After I did my first loan, I sent the Kiva link to friends, hoping they would get want to help change a life or two with not a whole lot of work... maybe loan $25 or $50. I hoped they would tell THEIR friends, and their friends would tell THEIR friends.
I have a standing offer to anyone I introduce to the site that if they can't afford to be without their $25 for a few months, I will loan it to them, and they can can pay me back when the loan is paid off! And if I introduce them, and I see that they have not loaned, or borrowed money from me to loan...well, then I take them off my list of friends... :) Well...maybe not completely...but I will give them a hard time about it!
So here's to 10,000 loans! We'd better get busy! We've got a whole lotta ground to cover!
Cheers!
lender.occupational_info: I help people start and thrive in business.

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I have a great respect for people who try and do something I am quite concerned by climate change and its impact on African countries where food will become in short supply

lender.occupational_info: Now I stop the rain from falling directly on the ground. There was a short time, only a few hundred years, after I was incised, when I got visited regularly by humans. Those were the days…

lender.occupational_info: i am hardworking honest and have good interpersonal skills in managing and executing the jobs asssigned to me

lender.name: Paula and Madison
lender.loan_because: Paula-My granddaughter and I realize how much we are given and want to share with others less fortunate. What a wonderful learning tool this is for my granddaughter to see that when many people give a small amount a large miracle happens. Madison-My grandma is allways setting a good example for me and my brother. She's a wonderfull woman and she will put you before herself no matter what. That's why I love her so much...well,that and she's a great hugger! I can't wait to see the people we helped grow their bisnesses,and become more sucessful.
lender.occupational_info: Paula was a school secretary for 25 years and is now retired. Madison is 14 years old and will be in 9th grade in the fall.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: My employer made me aware of the KIVA organization. This is a way to see what good can be done by sharing your good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I engineer useful chemical products, like soap, cleaners, and candles, that can be easy on the world's environment. They don't require too much energy or oil to make, and they don't pollute. They work and smell great, and we minimize packaging - but it still has to recycle!

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs' access to resources such as low interest loans or other forms of reasonable financing are not available in many parts of the world. Being adequately financed at the launch of a business is very important and providing start up capital through Kiva.org helps many small businesses during their launch.
lender.occupational_info: I research patents for entrepreneurs, inventors, and businesses. I do research to see if an idea has already been patented.

lender.occupational_info: I design software products, hopefully, ---- based on the consideration of an individual's or group's needs, desires, beliefs, knowledge, skills, experiences, and perceptions.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should be the change we want to see.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it's not all about me.

lender.name: Willie
lender.loan_because: It's easy. People have given me larger breaks than a 25,00$ loan. Why not? I like the idea that the money can, and will likely, stay in kiva and recycle to other projects. It's the loan that keeps on loaning....So it's a small thing, added to a bunch of other small things....adds up.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lighting technician. I install electrical power cables, focus lighting instruments, apply correcting and control media to lighting instruments, make coffee for the boss to keep him smiling ;) .

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.loan_because: I have respect for entrepreneurs and I want to support their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I create software that interacts with pacemaker and defibrillator systems.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to loan because I admire these entrepreneurs very much and strive to have the same determination to succeed as they do.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying nursing in order to work in a hospital to care for people when they need it most.

lender.name: The Snyder Family
lender.loan_because: To make an immediate and lasting difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate financial consulting and analysis

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I love to be able to help others that are less fortunate than I am. As soon as I read about Kiva I knew I would become a lender. I hope to be able to give many loans to more people al over the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because:
There comes a time when we must stop taking and begin giving back. We do this for the people we are helping, for the example we give to our children and so that we can smile when we close our eyes.
Peace, david
lender.occupational_info: I trade commodities during the day and write the rest of the time. I have a column in one magazine and write for several others. But my true love is writing novels. I've written three and am working on my fourth. I hope this one will get some attention and get picked-up by an agent and a publisher.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: it's the simple things you do in life that have the greatest impact.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: it changes someone else's life and mine.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility to bring the incredible power of individual entrepreneurship to people around the world who are not as fortunate as we are.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit that provides one on one, arts-based mentoring to under-served public school students in Los Angeles.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for what I have, believe in the multiplier effect, and feel great about empowering women.

lender.name: Thao
lender.loan_because: I understand how crucial the initial capital is. To my best ability, I want to help people to start their business and have a better life. Moreover, I believe that everyone can help others, no matter how big or small the act is! Love and empathy count!
lender.occupational_info: I love to physically, volunteer to help poor and homeless people, especially with medical need. Financially, I am far from being rich. In fact, I also have to take many big loans for my oversea education (I'm from Vietnam, and studying in the US). However, it doesn't stop me from helping others as much as I can, as many ways as I know, because I believe that good deeds are passed on, and maybe returned! Good luck to you all!

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: This site is unique and it is amazing to see how much change can happen when the 'bank' is no longer an institution but composed of socially conscious people on the internet.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an 'ethical bank' in Vancouver, Canada where I handle the administration of 'environmentally minded' loans to customers throughout Canada.

lender.name: Sandie
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: Education non-profit

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It's a cool and awesome way to help others! Which is something I am passionate about -- no matter where/who/what the people are. Also, I have been helped in the past -- why not turn around and pass it forward!!!
lender.occupational_info: I currently work on a legal research website. It's a pretty awesome computer science type job. I have a 18 year son who is my "real" job in life and two dogs.

lender.name: Judie
lender.loan_because: I honor the divine in you as the same divine that is in me, and we are one.
lender.occupational_info: I do my best to be All That I am in every moment and do my best to see All that each person is.

lender.name: Mike M. & family
lender.loan_because: We love KIVA -- our small loans can make a huge difference to people in other parts of the world. Reading KIVA stories is so encouraging.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenage students with mental and physical handicaps. My wife is an attorney. We have 2 sons, one 21 and one 15 years old.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the impact of my contributions. I believe in Kiva and Microlending. Quite honestly, I feel guilty about the disparity between my life and the poverty of others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the technology and media space. I try to develop fundamental products that have a twist to conventional methods.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I can...

lender.name: Sonny
lender.occupational_info: I make products that help people with diabetes manage their disease.

lender.name: Tiber and Milo
lender.loan_because: We like helping people who have kids just like us, but are not as lucky as we are.
lender.occupational_info: We play...all the time.

lender.name: Ang
lender.loan_because: 'I wept because I had no shoes, until I saw a man who had no feet' - Persian proverb

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: I found (in Kiva ) a place where i can directly help people who are doing everything to help themselves.

lender.name: Lloyd
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are motivated to help themselves. Kiva's system is more direct and helpful than normal charity donations, and it is good to be able to choose which projects my money is helping. Lending money rather than donating helps to prevent dependence on charity and encourages good, sustainable business practices.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I read Bill Clinton's book Giving and it inspired me.
lender.occupational_info: I am a property manager for a social housing provider.

lender.name: Stevens Family
lender.loan_because: Prayer and good wishes are not enough to feed the hungry and house the poor.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I see the big picture of things :)
lender.occupational_info: I provide insurance and financial services to help protect everything you've worked so hard for!

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I am able and there are so many people in need.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: it keeps me from losing sight of how lucky I am to have been born where and when I was. My grandma taught me at a young age to share with those less fortunate than me, even if I have very little myself.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language in France. I talk about social, political and cultural issues with twenty-year-olds from around the world.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Community is the purpose of life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the past to the future. I also learn from the future.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I believe that I should share my good fortune with others in the world who are trying to improve their lives, and those of their children and communities

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: People who work hard deserve a chance at success. I want to be a part of sharing my success in life with others in the world.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I am studying entrepreneurship in the non-profit sector, and this is a good opportunity to work hands-on with a business venture.

lender.name: Jacqui
lender.loan_because: I admire hard working people with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office during the week and at weekends I follow my real passion which is healing people with Reiki.

lender.name: Leif
lender.loan_because: I just wish to be a decent person by sharing a microscopic amount of my surplus with this world´s needy, preferably women and if they are sole bread-winners "I´m their man".
lender.occupational_info: Used to work as an accountant

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Enough micro-loans in a small village could create a small vibrant self sustaining economy and improve the quality of life for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: Basketball fan...that's all there is to life.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I believe I am making a difference helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I like helping others, especially entrepreneurs in a situation that does not lend easy access to credit.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: running a consultancy company

lender.name: Dorothee
lender.loan_because: You Have To Give People Something To Dream on. (Jimi Hendrix)

lender.name: Mallory
lender.loan_because: Jesus teaches, by example, to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school.

lender.name: Steen
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do in putting money to the most effective use in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with building computers that will hopefully make the world a better place.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: bill
lender.loan_because: Just Want To.

lender.name: joshua
lender.occupation: full time meat cutter, full time student

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I've read a lot about microfinance and would like to try lending myselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur in technology. My company produces technologies to enable people to communicate better.

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: it's the responsibility of all people to love their neighbors
lender.occupational_info: I work in the loan department of a regional bank.

lender.name: Our Spanish Class
lender.loan_because: GIVING IS KIND
lender.occupational_info: Seventh grade Spanish Class learning about the culture and language of Spanish speaking countries

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I feel drawn to others who are working hard to achieve their goals and dreams. Namaste.
lender.occupational_info: I work as the assistant to the CEO of a public medical device company.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.

lender.name: Aurélia & students
lender.loan_because: I worked with one of my classes on the 'pay it forward' concept, and a friend of mine (Hi Dan!) told me about this project he had in mind: He's a teacher as well, and said a good idea would be to get the students involved in a Kiva project, asking them to decide which person most needed a loan at a given time. He would personally give $50 of his own money to that person. I made it $100, and all the kids chipped in to raise another $100, so we were able to lend $200 between us. We hope that the group will find a final lender soon!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is the best way to reach those in the greatest need.
lender.occupational_info: I write textbooks on statistical methods in the behavioral sciences

lender.name: Purna Ravi Kumar
lender.loan_because: I have Netcenter with 8 systems.I want to add 2 more systems and modify my shop little.
lender.occupational_info: I provide net service to students,housewifes & job seekers. I am in the business for 6years.I provide service at reasonable rate.

lender.name: Kay & Don West
lender.loan_because: We believe that working capital partnered with vision and hard work can turn dreams into powerful creations. Participating as micro-lenders we are changing the stars and altering the course for those who receive assistance and faithfully discharge the stewardship necessary to make an enterprise be successful.
lender.occupational_info: We create where there was not, we change for the better where there is...

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Yoav
lender.loan_because: So little can do so much.
lender.occupational_info: I teach economics in a mid-size university on the East Coast of the United States. In addition to teaching, I work on various research and service projects, like running workshops on personal finance.

lender.name: Allana
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the human spirit, and that culture is strengthened by individuals who have the desire to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student and single mother.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children to help them talk and communicate.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Edmeston Interact Club
lender.loan_because: giving of what we have to help others become self-sufficient is important to us.
lender.occupational_info: We are a community based teen service club affiliated with Rotary International.

lender.name: Luly
lender.loan_because: love to help..

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I have started a software company that helps businesses that create things save time & money.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help. This is a great way to provide support to a large number of people with a relatively small amount of money.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the messaging and educational resources for a group dedicated to finding a cure for a cancer called GIST and help those living with it until then.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: as an entrepreneur I sometimes need encouragement and inspiration, and there is no shortage of it here!
lender.occupational_info: Alongside governments there are many of us working with science and society to balance the needs of today with those of tomorrow.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I care for an elderly relative at home and teach English part -time as a volunteer, to refugees and asylum seekers in the U.K

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I got a wonderful Kiva gift certificate for Valentine's Day!
